name: Breakfast Potatoes ( Vegan )
description: Delicious crispy baked breakfast potatoes roasted to perfection in the oven with dried herbs, onions, garlic, and bell pepper. Â These are so easy to make and even better than your favorite diner's roasted potatoes.
recipeIngredient: 2  potatoes, Yukon good or russet, (Peeled and cubed to a 1/4 inch)
1 cup bell pepper  (5.26 oz, finely chopped, red or green or both)

recipeInstructions.text: Add all of the ingredients except oil to a baking dish. Drizzle with oil and mix everything well to coat evenly.
recipeInstructions.name: Add all of the ingredients except oil to a baking dish. Drizzle with oil and mix everything well to coat evenly.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 25 to 35 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. Broil for a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 25 to 35 minutes or until the potatoes are tender. Broil for a minute.

keywords: breakfast potatoes recipe, breakfast with potatoes, recipe for breakfast potatoes
